title: A community with passion.
hero-p-3: and counting, Vignette is home for creative and fun people. And it'll keep getting bigger.
discord-p: Join the Discord to chat with the developers and like-minded people.
github-p: Participate in the development through our GitHub.
twitter-p: Follow us on Twitter to get the latest updates up to speed.
email-p: If you need a more professional or more private way to contact us, our email is available to answer your inquiries.
survey-p: Hey Streamers! Got a minute? Share your thoughts and help us improve!
